scripts.deploy: bash -c 'set -euo pipefail; opennextjs-cloudflare build --skipWranglerConfigCheck --yes; if [ ! -d .open-next ]; then echo "❌ OpenNext output (.open-next) not found" >&2; exit 1; fi; rm -rf .vercel && mkdir -p .vercel/output; cp -R .open-next/. .vercel/output/; if [ ! -d .vercel/output/static ]; then echo "⚠️ .vercel/output/static missing; creating empty dir for Cloudflare Pages" >&2; mkdir -p .vercel/output/static; fi'
